column1: Uchi////Extremely slow service.  Asked the waitress to run wild and bring out whatever she liked for the enveing.  Our table and glasses were empty for the great majority of the night. We kept waiting hoping it would get better
column2: but it never did.  Our mind was blown
column3: in a bad way.  Hoping this place is a flash in the pan because I am sick of hearing about it. Womp womp...
